revision.text:
void '''Howl''' ()
==Usage== Plays the {{Property|HowlSound|howl sound}} of the actor. The sound is played on the ''body'' [[Sound channels|channel]] with ''normal'' attenuation. The function does nothing if that sound is already playing on that channel, regardless of the means by which it was originally played.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:DECORATE]] [[Category:ZScript]]
